mapper.sql: e.e_id, e.event_number, e.event_desc, e.event_title, e.receive_time, e.incident_time, e.incident_location, e.lng, e.lat, e.influence_sphere, e.incident_area_id, e.pt_id, pt.pt_name, e.report_mechanism_id, m.m_name, e.mechanism_id, me.m_name as mechanism_name, e.reporter, e.report_tel, e.d_id, d.d_name, e.status, e.process, e.summary, e.merge_reason, e.event_level, e.verify_method, e.event_type, e.verify_status, e.report_type, e.attach_addr
mapper.insert: insert into event_receive (e_id, event_number, event_desc, event_title, receive_time, incident_time, incident_location, lng, lat, influence_sphere, incident_area_id, pt_id, report_mechanism_id, mechanism_id,reporter, report_tel, d_id, status, process, summary, merge_reason, event_level, verify_method, event_type, verify_status, report_type, mechanism_id, attach_addr) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incidentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incidentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{influenceSphere,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incidentAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reportMechanismId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mechanismId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportTel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{did,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{process,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mergeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{verifyMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mechanismId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attachAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update event_receive
event_number = #{eventNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_desc = #{eventDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_title = #{eventTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
receive_time = #{receiveTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
incident_time = #{incidentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
incident_location = #{incidentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
influence_sphere = #{influenceSphere,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
incident_area_id = #{incidentAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pt_id = #{ptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_mechanism_id = #{reportMechanismId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reporter = #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_tel = #{reportTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
d_id = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
process = #{process,jdbcType=INTEGER},
summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
merge_reason = #{mergeReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
event_level = #{eventLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verify_method = #{verifyMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
event_type = #{eventType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
verify_status = #{verifyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_type = #{reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mechanism_id = #{mechanismId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
attach_addr = #{attachAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where e_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from event_receive e, plan_type pt, mechanism m, duty d, mechanism me where e.pt_id = pt.pt_id and e.report_mechanism_id = m.id and e.d_id = d.id and e.mechanism_id = me.id and e.verify_status < 3

select
from event_receive e, plan_type pt, mechanism m, duty d, mechanism me where e.pt_id = pt.pt_id and e.report_mechanism_id = m.id and e.d_id = d.id and e.mechanism_id = me.id and e.verify_status < 3 and e.event_title like concat('%',#{eventTitle},'%') and e.d_id = #{did, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select count(e_id) from event_receive e where 1 = 1 and e.verify_status < 3
mapper.insert: insert into event_param(id, e_id, event_number, pp_id, pp_value) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ppValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ep.id, ep.e_id, ep.event_number, ep.pp_id, ep.pp_value, pp.pp_name from event_param ep, plan_param pp where ep.pp_id = pp.pp_id and e_id = #{eid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into event_development(id, e_id, report_time, report_content, reporter) values (#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reporter,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
